mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.transaction_timestamp_date,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time, count(1) bet_count, SUM(d.amount) betamount,SUM(d.payoff) winlose, SUM(d.validate_amount) validamount FROM ds_mg_game d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.transaction_timestamp_date,'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(*) as bet_count,sum(amount) as betamount,sum(validate_amount) as validamount,sum(payoff) as winlose from ds_mg_game

SELECT IFNULL(t.id,60000) as game_type, IFNULL(t.game_name,'MG电子游戏') game_name, COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.amount) betamount, SUM(d.payoff) winlose, SUM(d.validate_amount) validamount FROM ds_mg_game d LEFT JOIN ds_game_type t ON d.game_code = t.out_game_code AND t.fk_live_id=15 and t.parent_id = 60
GROUP BY d.game_code
mapper.sql: id, siteId, username, playername, hor_key, bet_col_id, win_lose_type, hor_ne_key, mbr_ne_key, bet_trans_key, game_key, game_code, type, product, transaction_timestamp, transaction_timestamp_date, amount, validate_amount, payoff, mbr_code, mbr_alias, game_casino_id, game_poker_id, game_poker_type, ref_type, ref_key, after_tx_wallet_amount, mgs_game_id, mgs_action_id, clrng_amnt, game_platform_type, create_time, last_update_time, memo
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from ds_mg_game
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from ds_mg_game
order by ${orderByClause}
